name: breqdi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c1))

comment: Equality deduction for a binary relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Oct-2020.)
